name: Cloak
description: their lower face remains hidden behind a dark cloak that could easily hide any number of weapons.

name: Ornate Robe
description: their body is sporting a long robe of ornate origins held together with a long golden thread.

name: Tattered robe
description: their robe has clearly seen better days although they continues to sport it proudly.

name: Robe
description: they dresses in a simple brown robe. Similar in material to that of a potato sack.

name: Ornate Armour
description: the armour across their body appears expensive. You seem unsure as to how much the ornate trims of gold and silver must have cost.

name: Simple Armour
description: the armour they sports is of simple origin, potentially made by the local blacksmith.

name: Hand Crafted Armour
description: you wouldn't be surprised if they had made this armour themself, it looks badly hand crafted.

name: Brawlers wear
description: they appears to have been in many brawls as their tattered shirt has been caked in layers of different colored blood and has seemingly never before seen soap.

name: Merry tunic
description: they wears a tunic made of what appears to be a single large piece of green fabric worn above a set of makeshift tights.

name: plain shirt
description: they wears a rather uninspired plain red shirt.

name: leather coat
description: above what looks like a plain shirt, they wears a long tanned leather coat.

name: peasent's clothes
description: their clothes appear tattered and ruined but you get the feeling that they would be unable to get new ones if they wanted to...

name: nobel's clothes
description: their purple ruffled shirt contains the beautifully embroided crest of one of the nobel houses adorned with golden trims.
